name: cloudkms
custom_content: This directory contains snippets for Google Cloud KMS API. The Google Cloud KMS API is a service that allows you to keep encryption keys centrally in the cloud, for direct use by cloud services. More info about Cloud KMS can be found at https://cloud.google.com/kms/docs/

samples.name: Quickstart
samples.description: This quickstart shows you how to create and use encryption keys with Cloud Key Management Service.
samples.custom_content: More information about the Cloud KMS quickstart is available at https://cloud.google.com/kms/docs/quickstart
